sect1.title: Book version
sect1.para: This is BLFS-BOOK version &version; dated &releasedate;. If this version is older than a month a newer version is probably already available for download. Check one of the mirror sites below for updated versions.

sect1.title: Mirror sites
sect1.para: The BLFS project has a number of mirrors setup world-wide to make it easier and more convenient for you to access the website. Please visit the http://www.linuxfromscratch.org/blfs website for the list of current mirrors.
